Documentation

Introduction

Hubstack-AdminPro is a WebApp template for admin dashboards and control panels. It is fully responsive HTML template, which is based on the CSS framework Bootstrap 4. It utilizes all of the Bootstrap components in its design and re-styles many commonly used plugins to create a consistent design that can be used as a user interface for backend applications.


Folder Structure

After purchasing our template extract the zip file and you will see this structure.

                                    
    
    ├── Hubstack-AdminPro     
    |   ├── includes/
    |   ├── layouts/
    │   ├── assets/
    │   │   ├── scss/
    │   │   │   └── components/
    │   │   │   └── config/
    │   │   │   └── customs/
    │   │   │   └── layouts/
    │   │   │   └── style.scss
    │   │   │   └── style-dark.scss
    │   │   └── css/
    │   │   └── images/
    │   │   └── js/
    │   ├── docs/
    │   ├── html/
    │   │   └── html pages
    │   ├── config.yml
    │   ├── gulpfile.js
    │   ├── package.json
    |   └── .gitignore

Get Started

You can start by installing Node Package Manager.

The Node Package Manager - Npm is a default package manager for the JavaScript runtime environment Node.js. If you've already then update once.

npm install --global npm@latest
To check weather is node succesfully install or not.
npm --version

You can procced then by installing Gulp

Gulp is a cross-platform, streaming task runner that lets developers automate many development tasks. To install gulp globally has include:

npm install --global gulp-cli
If you have previously installed gulp then remove it.
npm rm --global gulp
To check weather is gulp succesfully install or not.
gulp --version

You can procced then by installing Jekyll

Jekyll is a static site generator. You give it text written in your favorite markup language and it uses layouts to create a static website. You can tweak how you want the site URLs to look, what data gets displayed on the site, and more. To install Jekyll globally follow the instruction to the jekyll website:

https://jekyllrb.com/docs/installation/
To check weather is Jekyll succesfully install or not.
jekyll -v

Then You set.

Aslo you run:

npm install

What next, you can launch your App

npm run dev

This command will execute all the assets(js,scss and html) to the _site folder separately.


Usage

There is two Yaml configuration files: `_config.yml` and `_config.dev.yml` that when running in development mode the _dev_ configuration file overrides `baseurl` and `jekyll-minifier` default values.
